text: Anyone else seeing the payment button broken on mobile? Getting a 500 error every time I try to checkout.
Yes! It's been happening since last Tuesday's deploy. iOS Safari specifically.
Customer just called in — she said she gave up trying to buy and went to a competitor. We need to fix this ASAP.
Onboarding flow is also confusing our new users. Had 3 people ask this week what the 'workspace' concept means.
The CSV export feature people keep asking for — any update on timeline? Sales keeps getting this question on demos.
The dashboard loads really slowly when you have more than 50 projects. Users with big accounts are complaining.
Mobile app crashes when you try to upload files larger than 5MB. Reproducible every time on Android.
Users can't figure out how to invite team members. The settings page buries it under a weird submenu.
Password reset emails are going to spam for Gmail users. CX team is getting flooded with tickets about this.
The onboarding checklist doesn't remember progress if you close the browser. Users have to start over every time.
Search is basically broken. If I search for 'invoice' I don't get results unless I spell it exactly right. No fuzzy matching.
Notification settings don't save properly. Users turn off email notifications and they turn back on the next day.
Big enterprise prospect asked about SSO. We don't have it and they said it's a dealbreaker. Third one this month.
The billing page throws an error when users try to downgrade their plan. This is blocking churned customers from leaving cleanly.
Users want dark mode. Getting this feature request constantly in our community forum.
